sourcesContent:
import React, { FC } from 'react'; const PrivacyPolicy: FC = () => (

Privacy Policy

Your privacy is important to us. It is VoiceCapsule's policy to respect your privacy and comply with any applicable law and regulation regarding any personal information we may collect about you, including through our app and our website, https://www.voicecapsule.com.

This policy is effective as of 8 July 2024 and was last updated on 8 July 2024.

1. Information We Collect

Information we collect includes both information you knowingly and actively provide us when using or participating in any of our services, and any information automatically sent by your devices in the course of accessing our products and services.

1.1 Voice Recordings

As a voice journaling app, VoiceCapsule collects and stores the voice recordings you create within the app. These recordings are considered highly personal, and we treat them with the utmost care and confidentiality.

1.2 Log Data

When you use our app, our servers automatically record certain log data, including your IP address, app version, device type, and usage statistics.

2. How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:

  • Provide, operate, and maintain our app
  • Improve, personalize, and expand our app
  • Understand and analyze how you use our app
  • Develop new products, services, features, and functionality
  • Communicate with you for customer service, updates, and marketing purposes
  • Analyze your voice recordings to provide insights and analytics (with your explicit consent)

3. Data Storage and Security

Your voice recordings and personal data are stored securely in the cloud. We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information and voice data.

4. Data Retention

We will retain your personal information and voice recordings only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this privacy policy. You can delete your account and associated data at any time through the app settings.

5. Your Rights

You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information and voice recordings. You can do this directly within the app or by contacting us.

6. Changes to This Policy

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "last updated" date.

7. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@voicecapsule.com.

); export default PrivacyPolicy;
